Recommendations: the department of biology should comply with the guideline define by the university manual of operation in extension familiarization or reorientation of the guideline may be conduct

the design extension program and project should be base on the need and problem of the adopt community a need and problem assessment survey should be conduct and it result should be utilized as baseline information for design the program and project

continuous and regular monitoring and evaluation of the extension project should be undertaken a system for monitoring and evaluation extension project may be devise appropriate instrument for monitoring and evaluation may be developed
more faculty member of the department of biology should actively participate in it extension and community involvement project and other related activity
the adopt community should actively participate in the planning implementation monitoring and evaluation of extension project
the department of biology should endeavor to generate additional fund for it extension program and project
wider dissemination of it extension program and project should be make
a systematic and continuous documentation of the extension program and project and other related activity should be pursue vigorously
